channel.title: 'Postgres | Supabase Blog
channel.description: Latest Postgres news from Oliver Rice at Supabase

item.title: PostgREST 12
item.description: PostgREST 12 is out and we take a look at some of the major new features like JWT Caching and Aggregate Functions

item.title: pg_graphql: Postgres functions now supported
item.description: pg_graphql now supports the most requested feature: Postgres functions a.k.a. User Defined Functions (UDFs)

item.title: pgvector: Fewer dimensions are better
item.description: Increase performance in pgvector by using embedding vectors with fewer dimensions

item.title: What's New in pg_graphql v1.2
item.description: New Features in the v1.2 release of pg_graphql

item.title: Type Constraints in 65 lines of SQL
item.description: Creating validated data types in Postgres

item.title: pg_graphql v1.0
item.description: Announcing the v1.0 release of pg_graphql

item.title: pg_jsonschema: JSON Schema support for Postgres
item.description: Today we're releasing pg_jsonschema, a Postgres extension for JSON validation.

item.title: Postgres Auditing in 150 lines of SQL
item.description: PostgreSQL has a robust set of features which we can leverage to create a generic auditing solution in 150 lines of SQL.
